trans-unit.target: 枯萎秘柜

trans-unit.resname: SCG·140 | Ark of Blight | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Ark of Blight: Destroy target land.
trans-unit.target: {三}，{横置}，牺牲枯萎秘柜：消灭目标地。

trans-unit.resname: SCG·140 | Ark of Blight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When opened, it erases entire landscapes from minds and maps.
trans-unit.target: 一旦开启，便将整个地景自心灵与地图中抹去。

trans-unit.source: Proteus Machine
trans-unit.target: 百变械

trans-unit.resname: SCG·141 | Proteus Machine | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Morph {0} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 变身{零}（你可牌面朝下地使用此牌并支付{三}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: SCG·141 | Proteus Machine | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Proteus Machine is turned face up, its type becomes the creature type of your choice. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 当百变械翻回正面时，选择一种生物类别，它成为该类别。（此效应不因回合结束而终止）

trans-unit.source: Those who bring nothing to the temple take nothing away.
